chapter.text: 19|1|kapeu ha ya ain swadeu
19|2|igeos-eun geudae junim-ui jong jaka lia-ege bepul-eojin eunhyee gwanhan eongeub-ila
19|3|bola geuneun eunmilhi geuui ju nim-eul buleudeola
19|4|geuga malhagil juyeo jeoui ppyeodeul eun heoyaghayeojigo meolineun baegbal-i doeeossnaida jeoneun junimkke giwonhayeochugbogbadji anihan jeog-i eobs-eossseubnida
19|5|nae hue ol nae chincheogdeul-i haenghalgeos-i dulyeobnaida je anaega bul-im ioni dangsin-eulobuteo han sangsog-in-eul juobsoseo
19|6|geulihayeo jeoui daeleul isgo ya gob-ui gagyeleul isgehayeo jusigo ju yeo geuleul dangsinkkeseo manjoghasineun ja lo hayeo jusoseo
19|7|jakaliayeo hananim-i neoege adeul-ui sosig-eul julini geuui ileum eun yohan-ila geu ileum-eun eoneu nu guegedo juji anihaessdeon ileum-inila
19|8|ittae geuga malhagil juyeo jega eotteohge aileul gajil su issgessseubni kka jeoui anaeneun bul-im-imyeo jeoneun imi nosoehayeossseubnida hadeola
19|9|geubunkkeseo ileusigil geuleohge doelila neoui junim-i malsseumhasa geugeos eun naege swiun il-inila hasyeoss-eumyeo naneun imi ijeon-e jonjaechi anh-assdeon neoleul changjohaji anihaessdeonyo
19|10|geuga juyeo jege geu yejeung-euljuobsoseo lago malhani junimkkeseo ileusigil geu yejung-eulo nega geonjeon hamyeonseodo sam-ildong-an salamdeul-ege mal-eul moshalila
19|11|geulihayeo geuneun yebaedang-eseo geuui baegseong-egelo naga achim jeonyeog-eulo hananim-eul chanmihala geudeul-ege sonjis-eulo malhadeola
19|12|yohan-iyeo i seongseoleul dandanhi jikila hananim-eun geuga eolyeoss-eul ttae geuege jihyeleul jueossnola
19|13|geuligo hananim-egyeseo jaaewa-eunchong-eul bad-ass-euni geuneun gyeong-geonha-eossdeo la
19|14|geuui bumo-egedo sunjong hayeoss go ttohan geuneun geomanhajido ani ha yeoss-eumyeo omanhamdo eobs-eossnola
19|15|geuga tansaenghan nalgwa geuga imjonghaneun nalgwa geuga buhwalhaneun nal-e geu ege pyeonghwaga iss-eul geos-ila
19|16|seongseoe issneun geudaelo malia e gwanhayeo iyagihala geunyeoga ga jog-eul dugo dongjjog eoneu gos-eulo tteo nassdeon yaegiinila
19|17|geudeul-i boji ani hadolog geunyeoga eolgul-eul galiwoss-eul ttae hananim-i geu nyeoege cheonsaleul bonaeni geuneun geunyeo ap-e salangcheoleom natanassdeola
19|18|ittae geunyeoga jeoneun jabilou sin hananimkke guwonhanaida sillo dangsin-i gyeong-geonhan jalamyeon jeoleul haechi ji masoseo lago malhamae
19|19|geuga malhagil sillo naneun dang sin junim-ui sajalosseo seongseuleoun a deul-ui sosig-eul jeonhagi wihae wassnola haneo
19|20|geunyeoga malhagil eoneu namjado jeoleul jeobchoghaji anihaessgo ttohan bu jeong-eul jeojileujido ani haessneunde eo tteohge jega adeul-eul gajil su issseubni kka

19|21|ie geuga malhagil geuleohge doe lila dangsin-ui junimkkeseo geugeos-eun nae ge swiun il-ila geulohayeogeum baegseong eul wihan yejeung-i doege hago hananim ui eunhyega doedolog imi geuleohge myeong hayeojin il-ieossnola
19|22|geulihayeo geunyeoneun ingtaehago meolli tteol-eojin gos-eulo olmgyeogassdeola
19|23|chulsan-ui jintong-i simhayeo geunyeo neun jonglyeonamu julgie gidaego malha gil ijeon-e jug-eobeolyeossdamyeon joyonghi ij-eobeolil su issneun il-inde
19|24|geuttae jonglyeonamu mit-eseo cheonsa ga geunyeoleul buleudeoni seulpeohaji mal la ne junimkkeseo ne mit-e heuleuneun naesmul-eul dusyeossnola
19|25|jonglyeonamu julgileul nega issneun jjog-eulo hondeul-eola geuleomyeon jal ig-eun yeolmaega neoegelo tteol-eojilini
19|26|meoggo masieo ma-eum-eul pyeong-anke hala geuligo nega salam-eul mannageo deun jeoneun hananimkke dansighal geos-eul maengsehayeoss-eumae oneul nuguwado mal-eulhaji anh-eul geos-ila malhayeola
19|27|eolma hu geunyeoga adeul-eul angoseo salamdeul-ege natanani maliayeoneoneun isanghan geos-eul gajigo wassguna lago jolonghadeola
19|28|alon-ui nu-iyeo neoui abeoji neun nappeun salam-i anieossgo ne eomeonido bujeonghan yeojaga anieossnola
19|29|geuleoja geunyeoneun geuaeleul galeu kyeossdeola ittae moduga yolam-an-e iss neun agiwa eotteohge mal-eul halan mal-i nyo lago malhadeola
19|30|agiga malhagil naneun hananim-uijong-eulo geubunkkeseo naege seongseoleul jusigo naleul yeeonjalo taeghasyeossseubnida
19|31|jega eodie issdeon jeojeul chugbog bad-eunjalo hasyeossgo jega sal-a issneun han yebaeleul deuligo iseullamseleul ba chila jeoege myeonglyeonghayeossseubnida
19|32|jeoui mochin-ege hyodohala hasyeossgo jeolo hayeogeum geomanhaji anihagobulhaengham-i eobsdolog hasyeossseubnida
19|33|jega tansaenghan nalgwa jega imjong haneun nalgwa jega sal-aseo buhwalhaneun nal-e jeoege pyeonghwaga issdolog hasyeoss seubnida
19|34|geugeos-i balo maliaui adeul yesue daehan iyagilo igeos-eun geu deul-i nonjaenghaneun geos-e daehan jinliui malsseum-ila
19|35|hananimkkeseoneun adeul-eul gajil pil-yoga eobsnola geubunkke yeong-gwang-i iss eusoseo geubun-i eotteon geos-eul wonhasil ttae malsseum-eul naelisini iss-eola geuleo myeon issneunila
19|36|jinsillo hananim-eun naui junim iyo neohui junim-isini geubun man-eul gyeongbaehala igeos-i gajang baleun gil-i la
19|37|geuleonde geudeul gaunde mulideul i uigyeon-eul dallihani widaehan simpan ui nal bulsinhaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
19|38|geudeul-i hananim-egelo oneun nal geudeul-eun bunmyeonghi deul-eul geos-imyeo ttobunmyeonghi bolila geuleona oneul-ui eo liseog-eun jadeul-eun bunmyeonghi banghwanghage doelila
19|39|geudeul-ege gotong-ui nal-eul gyeong-go hala geudeul-i mid-eum-eul geeulli hal ttaeil-eun gyeoljeongdoeeojinola
19|40|jinsillo hananim-eun daejiwa geu wie issneun modeun geos-eul sangsoghanani geudeul moduneun hananim-egelo gwiuihanola
19|41|seongseoan-e issneun abeulaham-eun jinsilhan yeeonjayeoss-eum-eul sang-gisikila
19|42|geuga geuui abeojikke wae deud jido moshago bojido moshamyeo dangsin kke hyoyongdo eobsneun geos-eul sungbaehago issseubnikka
19|43|abeoji dangsinkke ileuji moshan jisig-i jeoege ileuleossnani jeoleul ttaleusibsiyo jega abeojileul baleun gillo annaehagessseubnida
19|44|abeoji satan-eul seomgimyeon ani doebnida sillo satan-eun hananim-eul bae banhayeossseubnida
19|45|abeojiga hananim-eulobuteo beol-eul bad-a satan-ui chinguga doelkka dulyeobseubnida

19|46|ittae abeojikkeseo daedabhasa abeulaham-a neoneun naui sindeul-eul silh-eohaneunyo nega dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeon naega neoleul dollo ttaelil geos-ila geuligo nalobuteo olaesdong-an tteol-eojyeo issge halila
19|47|abeulaham-i abeoji pyeong-anhasoseo abeojileul wihae junimkke yongseoleul bilgessseubnida junim-eun jeoege jabileulbepusyeossseubnida
19|48|jeoneun yeoleobundeulgwa hananim oe e yeoleobundeul-i sungbaehaneun geos-eul tteo na jeoui junimkke gido deuligessseubni da junim-e-ui jeoui gidoneun chugbog-eul bad-eul geos-ibnida
19|49|geuga hananim anin daleun geos-eulsungbaehaneun geudeul-eul beoligo tteonass-eul ttae hananim-eun geuege isaggwa yagob ol jueo geudeullo hayeo yeeonjaga doege hayeossnola
19|50|hananim-eun geudeul-ege eunhyeleul bepul-eossgo jinsil-ui mallo geudeul-eul nop yeossnola
19|51|seongseosog-e issneun daelo mose-ui iyagileul deullyeojula geuneun seontaegbad-eun-yeeonjaimyeo seonjijaieossnola
19|52|hananim-eun sinai san upyeon-e seo geuleul bulleoss-eumae sinbiui yaegileul nanugi wihae hananim-eun geuleul gakka i bulleossnola
19|53|hananim-i geuui gido-e eunhye leul bepusa geuui hyeongje alon-eul yeeonjalo dueossnola
19|54|seongseosog-e issneundaelo iseuma-el-ui iyagileul deullyeojula geuneun yagsog eul jikineun chungsilhan jalo yeeonjai myeo seonjija ieossnola
19|55|geuneun geuui baegseongdeul-ege yebae leul deuligo iseullamseleul bachil geos-eul chogguhasa junimkkeseoneun geulohayeo gippeohasyeossnola
19|56|seongseosog-ui ideuliseuui iyagileul deullyeojula geuneun jinsilhan yeeonjaieossnola
19|57|geulihayeo hananim-eun geuleul nop eun wichie dueossnola

19|58|ideul-eun adam-ui jasondeul gaunde hananimkkeseo eunhyeleul bepun yeeonjadeul-ila geu jung-eneun noawa hamkke bangjue oleun jaga iss-eossgo abeula hamgwa iseula-el jason-i iss-eumyeo geu jung-eneun hananim-i olh-eun gillo indo han jaga iss-eumyeo seontaeghan jaga iss-eossnola hananim-ui malsseum-i geudeul-ege gyesidoeeoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun buboghago gyeongbaehayeo nunmul-eul heullyeossnola
19|59|geuleonde geudeul ihue yebaeleul geeullihago yogjeong-eul chuguhan huyedeul-i iss-eoss-euni geudeul-eun myeolmanghal geos-i la
19|60|geuleona hoegaehayeo mid-eum-eul gaj go seon-eul haenghaneun janeun je-oedoeeo cheon gug-e deul-eogal geos-imyeo jogeumdo yogdoem i eobs-eulila
19|61|hananimkkeseo geubun-ui jongdeul-ege boiji anhneun eden-ui cheongug-eul yagsog hasyeoss-euni geubun-ui yagsog-i god oli la
19|62|geudeul-eun geu an-eseo jabdam-i a nin pyeong-an-ui insaleul deul-eumyeo geu an eseo joseog-eulo geudeul-ui il-yonghal yang sig-eul mankkighanila
19|63|geugeos-eun ag-eul gyeong-gyehaneun hana nim-ui jongdeul-ege sangsoghayeo jun cheongug ila

19|64|cheonsaga malhagil ulineun junim ui myeonglyeong-i anigoseoneun naelyeogal su eobsdoda uli ap-e issneun geos-ina u li dwie issneun geos-ina geu saie issneun modeun geos-i hananimkke soghano la geudae junim-eun gyeolko ij-ji ani hasinola
19|65|cheonjie issneun geosgwa geu saie issneun geos-i junim-ui geos-igeoneul geubun eul seomgim-e iss-eo geubungwa dongdeunghan da leun geos-eul algo issneunyo
19|66|midji anihan salamdeul-eun naega jug-eo dasi sal-anal su issdan mal-ingalago maldeulhani
19|67|iljjigi ingan-i jonjaehaji a nihaess-eul ttae hananim-i ingan-eul changjo haessdaneun geos-eul ingan-eun mang-gaghago iss neunyo
19|68|hananim-i geudeulgwa satandeul-eul bulleomoa muleup-eul kkulhdolog hayeo ji og-ui jubyeon-eulo moige halila
19|69|geuleonda-eum hananim-eun gag muli mada hananim-e daehae jeil omanhaess deon jadeul-eul kkeul-eo naelil geos-ila
19|70|hananim-eun geugos-eseo nuga bul e tayahal jaingaleul gajang jal algogyesinila
19|71|neohui gaunde geogie ileuji anihal ja amudo eobsnani geugeos-eun neohuiga pihal su eobsneun junim-ui danhohan gyeoljeong-isila
19|72|geuleona hananimkkeseo ag-eul gyeong gyehaneun jadeul-eun gujehal geos-idoe sa aghan jadeul-eun geu an-eseo muleup-eul kkulhge halila
19|73|hananim-ui bunmyeonghan malsseum-i geu deul-ege nangsongdoel ttae bulsinjadeul-eun ga nanhan sin-ang-indeul-ege eoneu jjog-i ji wiga deo na-eumyeo salgie deo joh-eungalago malhadeola
19|74|geuleona hananim-eun geudeul ijeon e deo hullyunghago bogijoh-eun jangbileul gajin sedaedeul-eul myeolmangsikyeossnola

19|75|illeogalodoe mihog-e ppajinjadohananimkkeseoneun geuui saengmyeong-eul yuyehasini geudeullo hayeogeum yagsogdoen beolgwa naesega ileul ttae eoneu jjog-eo deo na ppeun gos-e iss-eumyeo eoneu jjog-i deo yag han gundaeingaleul aldolog halila
19|76|hananimkkeseoneun olbalo ganeun ideul-ege indoham-eul deohasimyeo seonhaeng ui ildeul-eun junim ap-eseo gajang joh-eun geos-eulo bosang-eul badge doelila
19|77|hananim-ui malsseum-eul bulsinhamyeonseo jaesangwa jason-i jueojil geos-ila malhaneun jaleul geudaeneun boassneunyo
19|78|geuneun boiji anhneun jisig-eul eod eossneunga animyeon hananimgwa yagsog-ila do hayeossdan mal-inyo
19|79|gyeolko geuleohji anhnola hananim eun geuga malhaneun geos-eul giloghal geos-i myeo geuege beol-eul deohalila
19|80|geuga malhaneun modeun geos-i hana nim-egelo dol-a-eul geos-imyeo geuneun ha nanim ap-e hollo natanalila
19|81|geudeul-eun hananim oee daleun geos eul sin-eulo sungbaehayeo geugeos-eulo him gwa yeong-gwang-eul eod-eulyeo hana
19|82|gyeolko geuleohji doeji anh-eulini geudeul-eun geudeul-ui usang-eul bulsinhage doego geudeul-ege jeog-i doelila
19|83|geudaeneun moleuneunga hananim-i bulsinjadeul-ege satandeul-eul bonaeeo geudeul-eul hwanage haessnola
19|84|geuleomeulo geudeul-e daehanghayeo seodulji malla hananim-eun geudeul-ui nal jaleul healigo issnola
19|85|geunal-e hananim-eun ag-eul gyeong-gye haneun ideul-eul hananim ap-e bulleo yeong-gwang-eul baddolog halila
19|86|geuligo joeindeul-eun jiog-eulo annaehani mogmaleun gachugcheoleom sseuleojilgeos-ila
19|87|hananim-ui yagsog-eul bad-eunja oeeneun eoneu nugudo jungjaehaji mos hanila
19|88|hananimkkeseo jason-eul dusyeossda malhaneun jadeul-i issdeola
19|89|sillo jeodeul-eun bulgyeolhan jujang-eul hanola
19|90|geuttaee haneul-i jjij-eojilyeo ha go daejiga gallajimyeo sandeul-i sansan jogag-i doelyeohani
19|91|ineun geudeul-i hananimkke jason i issdago bulgyeolhan mal-eul haessgi ttaemun-ila
19|92|hananim-eun jason-eul gajil pil-yo ga eobs-eusimae
19|93|cheonjiui modeun geos-i jong-eulosseo hananimkkelo ogi ttaemun-ila
19|94|jinsillo geubun-eun geudeul-eul algo gyesimyeo ttohan geudeul-eul healigo gye sini
19|95|geudeul gagjaneun simpan-ui nal moduga geubun-egelo onila
19|96|geuleona mid-eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghaneun geudeul-egeneun hananimkkeseo salang-eul bepusinola
19|97|hananim-eun gyeong-geonhan jadeul-egeneunbog-eum-eul jeonhago nonjaeng-eul ilsamneun ja deul-egeneun gyeong-gohagi wihae geugeos-eul geudaeui eon-eolo swibge haessnola
19|98|geudeul-ijeon hananim-i manh-eun se daeleul myeolmangsikyeossnola geudaeneun geu jung hansalam-ilado balgyeonhal su iss-eumyeo geudeul-ui sogsag-im-eul deul-eul su issneunyo
